import React from 'react'; import './MultiLevel.css'; import MenuSharpIcon from '@material-ui/icons/MenuSharp'; import CloseSharpIcon from '@material-ui/icons/CloseSharp'; const MultiLevel = () => { const [showList , setShowList] = React.useState(true) const handleClick = (event) => { setShowList(!showList); }; const handleClose =() =>{ setShowList(!showList); } return (
  • { showList ? : }
    • Video Games »
      • Car
      • Bike Race
      • Fishing
    • Barbies
    • Teddy Bear
    • Golf Set
  • Recent Toys
    • Yoyo
    • Doctor Kit
    • Fun Puzzle»
      • Cards
      • Numbers
    • Uno Cards
  • Toys Category
    • Battery Toys
    • Remote Toys »
      • Cars
      • Aeroplane
      • Helicopter
    • Soft Toys
    • Magnet Toys
) } export default MultiLevel;
